title: Jo Gideon – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Gideon, the Conservative MP for Stoke-on-Trent Central, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I’m backing Rishi Sunak. He backed Stoke-on-Trent Central as Chancellor of the Exchequer and he will continue to do so as Prime Minister. He has my full support. @Ready4Rishi
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
